mapper.select: select season_code as seasonCode,season_sn as seasonSn from season where enabled = 1 ORDER BY season_sort desc
select vendor_id from vendor where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select DISTINCT b.brand_id as brandId,b.english_name as englishName from brand b left join product p on(p.brand_id = b.brand_id) where p.vendor_id = #{vendorId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and b.enabled = 1
